short_description.en: $75-$200 rebate for ENERGY STAR® or ENERGY STAR® Most Efficient qualified clothes dryers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de entre $75 y $200 para las secadoras de ropa que cumplan los requisitos ENERGY STAR® o ENERGY STAR® Most Efficient.

short_description.en: $75 rebate for electric push lawn mowers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $75 para podadoras eléctricas de pie.

short_description.en: $500 rebate for electric riding lawn mowers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 para podadoras eléctricas de asiento.

short_description.en: $50 rebate for ENERGY STAR® qualified smart thermostats.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $50 para termostatos inteligentes que cumplen los requisitos ENERGY STAR®.

short_description.en: 100% of costs covered for switching to heat pump water heaters. Income-qualified residents only.
short_description.es: Cobertura del 100% de los costos del cambio a calentadores de agua con bomba de calor. Sólo para residentes que cumplan los requisitos de nivel de ingresos.

other_restrictions:
You can qualify for affordable home electrification if your household is at 80% AMI or through participation in one of the following programs:
•	Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
•	Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
•	Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
•	Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP)
•	Solar for All
•	Other Government assistance program

short_description.en: 100% of costs covered for upgrading electrical panels. Income-qualified residents only.
short_description.es: Cobertura del 100% de los costos para mejorar los centros de carga eléctrica. Sólo para residentes que cumplan los requisitos de nivel de ingresos.

other_restrictions:
You can qualify for affordable home electrification if your household is at 80% AMI or through participation in one of the following programs:
•	Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
•	Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
•	Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
•	Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP)
•	Solar for All
•	Other Government assistance program

short_description.en: 100% of costs covered for home weatherization (insulation and air sealing). Income-qualified residents only.
short_description.es: Cobertura del 100% de los costos de climatización de viviendas (aislamiento térmico y sellado hermético). Sólo para residentes que cumplan los requisitos de nivel de ingresos.

other_restrictions:
To be eligible for the Weatherization Assistance Program, households must have:

An annual income below 60% State Median Income (SMI), or
At least one household member receiving Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) or Supplemental Security Income (SSI) benefits.

short_description.en: 100% of costs covered for income-qualified homeowners to have solar photovoltaic (PV) systems installed by local contractors.
short_description.es: Cobertura del 100% de los costos para propietarios de vivienda que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos para la instalación de sistemas solares fotovoltaicos (FV) por medio de contratistas locales.

other_restrictions:
Homeowners and tenants can qualify by meeting the requirements below:

Receive assistance from one of the following programs:

Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP)
Other Government assistance program OR 80% AMI and below

short_description.en: 100% of costs covered for switching to induction cooktops or electric resistance stoves. Income-qualified residents only.
short_description.es: Cobertura del 100% de los costos del cambio a parrilas de inducción o parrillas de resistencia eléctrica. Sólo para residentes que cumplan los requisitos de nivel de ingresos.

other_restrictions:
You can qualify for affordable home electrification if your household is at 80% AMI or through participation in one of the following programs:
•	Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
•	Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
•	Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
•	Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP)
•	Solar for All
•	Other Government assistance program

short_description.en: 100% of costs covered for switching to qualified ducted or ductless heating systems. Income-qualified residents only.
short_description.es: Cobertura del 100% de los costos por cambiar a sistemas de calefacción con o sin ductos que cumplan los requisitos. Sólo para residentes que cumplan con el nivel de ingresos.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Ducted: 16 SEER (15.2 SEER2 equivalent); Ductless: >= 19 SEER
other_restrictions:
You can qualify for affordable home electrification if your household is at 80% AMI or through participation in one of the following programs:
•	Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
•	Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
•	Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
•	Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP)
•	Solar for All
•	Other Government assistance program

short_description.en: $375-$700 rebate for qualified ducted or ductless heat pump systems.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de entre $375 y $700 para sistemas de bomba de calor sin ductos o con ductos que cumplan los requisitos.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
SEER2 ≥ 15.2
EER2 ≥ 11.7
HSPF2 ≥ 7.8 OR SEER2 ≥ 16
EER2 ≥ 12
HSPF2 ≥ 9
